Tool

NameCategorical Coincidence
ID14
AuthorO.Conrad (c) 2016
Specificationgrid

Description

Calculates for each cell the categorical coincidence, which can be useful to compare different classifications.

Parameters

NameTypeIdentifierDescriptionConstraints
Input
Grids Grid list (input)GRIDS
Output
Number of CategoriesGrid (output)CATEGORIES
CoincidenceGrid (output)COINCIDENCE
Dominance of MajorityGrid (output)MAJ_COUNT
Value of MajorityGrid (output)MAJ_VALUE
Options
Radius [Cells]IntegerRADIUSMinimum: 0 Default: 0
